General.Name: Beijing Tricolor Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Tricolor Technology Co., Ltd manufactures and sells professional audio and video products worldwide. The company offers matrix switcher, video wall controller, KVM switches, signal transceiver and extenders, DSP, conference system, and accessories. Its products are used in multimedia video scenarios, such as command and control centers, conference rooms, and exhibitions. Beijing Tricolor Technology Co., Ltd was founded in 2011 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Green Central Plaza, Building 1, Beijing, China, 100095
